oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lawyers analyze media role in trial of 3 boys' killers
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West Memphis Three; West Memphis, Arkansas; murders; law; media; 1990s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Article from the Commercial Appeal. Analyzes the media role in the trials of the West Memphis Three.

oai_dc:dc.dc:format: photocopy of newspaper clipping, mounted, 4.5 x 6.5 in.
